#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int T;
long long int i,j,revi,revj,ans,reva;
scanf("%d",&T);
while(T--)
{
	revi=0;
	revj=0;
	reva=0;
	scanf("%lld%lld",&i,&j);
	while (i != 0)
   {
      revi = revi * 10;
      revi = revi + i%10;
      i       = i/10;
   }
  
   	while (j != 0)
   {
      revj = revj * 10;
      revj = revj + j%10;
      j       = j/10;
   }
 
	
	ans=revi+revj;
	   	while (ans != 0)
   {
      reva = reva * 10;
      reva = reva + ans%10;
      ans      = ans/10;
   }
	printf("%lld\n",reva);



}

return 0;
	
}
